trans-unit.source: Creates a message event subscription to route messages to the appropriate workflow instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> class using a specified queue name and instance ID.
The friendly name that identifies the queue.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the workflow instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> class using a specified queue name, instance ID, and subscription ID.
The friendly name that identifies the queue.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the workflow instance.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the subscription identifier.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> class using a specified queue name, subscription ID, interface type, and operation name.
The friendly name that identifies the queue.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the subscription identifier.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the interface.
The event name on the interface that represents the messaging operation for which you are creating a subscription.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.MessageEventSubscription"></xref> class using a specified queue name, instance ID, interface type, operation, and a subscription ID.
The friendly name that identifies the queue.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the workflow instance.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the interface.
The event name on the interface that represents the messaging operation for which you are creating a subscription.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the subscription identifier.
Gets the collection of correlation properties for the message that will map the incoming message together with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref>.
A list of correlation properties for the message that will map the incoming message together with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity"></xref>.
Gets or sets the interface type.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the interface.
Gets or sets the name of the method.
The name of the method.
Gets or sets the name of the queue to which this subscription belongs.
The name that identifies the queue to which this subscription belongs.
Gets or sets the unique identifier for this subscription.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the subscription identifier.
Gets or sets the `InstanceId` of the workflow for which this subscription was created.
The <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that indicates the workflow instance.
